abstract: New Mexico Medical Board votes to lift suspension of obstetrician-gynecologist Dr Christopher S Driskill of Hobbs, NM, after he completes course on professional and ethical behavor; Driskill was accused of having sex with patients and drinking on the job.
lead_paragraph: Officials cleared the way for an obstetrician-gynecologist to return to work after his license was suspended last year over accusations that he had sex with patients and drank on the job.

headline.main: New Mexico: Board Votes to End Doctor’s Suspension
headline.print_headline: New Mexico: Board Votes to End Doctor’s Suspension

snippet: Officials cleared the way for an obstetrician-gynecologist to return to work after his license was suspended last year over accusations that he had sex with patients and drank on the job.
